name: Rasher Basher 2: Boars Revenge for Android and iOS
blurb: Rasher Basher was launched in 2010. The game is great. We think it could be much better. We want to give it a sequel (squealquel?)

rewards.reward: A special PDF containing images of all of the characters within the game in 3D. We will also email you with updates of our progress as well a great big thank you for your amazing support.

A special PDF containing images of all of the characters within the game in 3D. We will also email you with updates of our progress as well a great big thank you for your amazing support. You will also get a cool Rasher Basher limited edition badge.

You will also get a cool Rasher Basher limited edition badge. You will also get a credit within the game thanking you for supporting indie game development.
